alert.note: Alert for Orange; Putnam; Rockland; Westchester (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued February 19 at 3:01PM EST until February 19 at 3:15PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM EST FOR HUDSON...PASSAIC...UNION...BERGEN...ESSEX...NORTHERN WESTCHESTER... SOUTHEASTERN ORANGE...PUTNAM AND ROCKLAND COUNTIES... At 300 PM EST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line extending from near New Preston to Union, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Heavy snow and blowing snow. Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel. Locations impacted include... Newark, Paterson, Elizabeth, Passaic, Wayne, Plainfield, Bloomfield, Hackensack, Linden, New City, Orange, Bergenfield, Paramus, West Milford and Ossining. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Reduce your speed and turn on headlights! During snow squalls, the visibility may suddenly drop to near zero in whiteout conditions. Slow Down! Rapid changes in visibility and road conditions are expected with this dangerous snow squall. Be alert for sudden whiteout conditions.
